BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.delay#
BlackBox.type:
delay#
  :: ( KnownDomain tag dom   -- ARG[0]
     , Undefined a )          -- ARG[1]
  => Clock tag                -- ARG[2]
  -> Enable tag               -- ARG[3]
  -> a                        -- ARG[4]
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[5]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.register#
BlackBox.type:
register#
  :: ( KnownDomain tag dom    -- ARG[0]
     , Undefined a )          -- ARG[1]
  => Clock tag                -- ARG[2]
  -> Reset tag                -- ARG[3]
  -> Enable tag               -- ARG[4]
  -> a                        -- ARG[5] (powerup value)
  -> a                        -- ARG[6] (reset value)
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[7]
  -> Signal clk a
BlackBox.template:
-- register begin~IF ~ISENABLED[4] ~THEN
~GENSYM[~COMPNAME_register][0] : block
  signal ~GENSYM[~RESULT_reg][1] : ~TYPO := ~CONST[5];
begin
  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[1]; ~IF ~ISSYNC[0] ~THEN
  ~GENSYM[~RESULT_r][2] : process(~ARG[2])
  begin
    if rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
        ~SYM[1] <= ~CONST[6]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      elsif ~ARG[4] then
        ~SYM[1] <= ~ARG[7]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[2] : process(~ARG[2],~ARG[3])
  begin
    if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
      ~SYM[1] <= ~CONST[6];
    elsif rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      if ~ARG[4] then
        ~SYM[1] <= ~ARG[7]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;~ELSE
~SYM[0] : block
  signal ~SYM[1] : ~TYPO := ~CONST[5];
begin
  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[1]; ~IF ~ISSYNC[0] ~THEN
  ~SYM[2] : process(~ARG[2])
  begin
    if rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
        ~SYM[1] <= ~CONST[6]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      else
        ~SYM[1] <= ~ARG[7]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[2] : process(~ARG[2],~ARG[3])
  begin
    if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
      ~SYM[1] <= ~CONST[6]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    elsif rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      ~SYM[1] <= ~ARG[7]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;~FI
-- register end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.clockGen
BlackBox.type:
clockGen
  :: KnownDomain tag dom -- ARG[0]
  => Clock tag

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.tbClockGen
BlackBox.type:
tbClockGen
  :: KnownDomain tag dom -- ARG[0]
  => Signal tag Bool     -- ARG[1]
  -> Clock tag

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.resetGen
BlackBox.type: resetGen :: KnownDomain tag dom => Reset tag
BlackBox.template:
-- pragma translate_off
~RESULT <= '1',
           '0' after ~IF~ISSYNC[0]~THEN(2999 ps + ~PERIOD[0]0 ps)~ELSE3001 ps~FI;
-- pragma translate_on

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeFromReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeFromReset :: Reset tag -> Signal tag Bool

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeToReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeToReset :: KnownDomain tag dom => Signal tag Bool -> Reset tag
